TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
SE: you just can't land them. 

SP: ability to refill my coffee mug just by touching it.

54 minutes ago, adsii1970 said:

SE: you just can't land them. 

SP: ability to refill my coffee mug just by touching it. 

SE: Unfortunately, everything else you touch turns into a donut

SP: the ability to turn anything I touch into a donut

hehehe

SE: EVERYTHING and EVERYONE that even barely touches you (even if its a single quark) turns into said donuts. You cant stop or control it.

SP: the ability to make people smile and feel better.

192609162021

SE: You are a drug dealer

SP: The ability to teleport in a simple manner

SE: Due to the lack of a positioning system, you finish inside the wall.

SP: (Delegates the SP wish to another user)

8 hours ago, Just Jim said:

SE: Unfortunately, everything else you touch turns into a donut

SP: the ability to turn anything I touch into a donut

a donut donate

SE: You are bankrupt from donating to everything.

SP: I always pick the right thing for any situation.

SE. The exit is to the left. The right door is a closet.

SP: MechJeb in the head.

SE: All that metal in your head makes it too heavy to go anywhere and so you just lie still.

SP: I have perfect aim.

SE: It's 10 ly away.

SP: An invisible, immaterial backpack/

SE: You can never find it.

SP: Magnifying vision.

SE: your stuck in full zoom.

SP: summoning Ronald McDonald

SE: You're hired as the McDonald's yard broomer, so meet Ronald first.

SP: Broom-assisted Levitation.

SE: Need fireworks to truly fly.

SP: Can glide

SE: You are android.

SP: Download github wiki's as pdf's.

SE: Only in an early version that all the platforms reject as being security vunerable.

SP: I can do anything that I have seen done.

SE you cannot do anything that you have not physically seen done in extreme detail first.

SP the ability to suppress emotion like the vulcans.

035309192021

SE: You suffer from earthquakes when angry.

SP: Asteroid attack mirror.

SE: Only works every 66 million years 

SP: ability to control nations

You can only control sea land.

Ability to fly at mach speed

Other machos also fly at mach speed, so need a lot of backups.

Ability to change the color of the engine plume.

SE: It's RGB mode and you have jitters and epilepsy.

SP: Add 0s to any number.

SE:Only added at the front.

SP: Lots of nice, normal, cheese.

SE: On your head.

SP: I can add as many zeroes as I want at the back.

SE: Once you start, you can't stop.

SP: Ability to always know where all hydrogen atoms are.

SE: you are always looking at them and so miss everything else.

SP: I can sing anybody to sleep.
